practice_phrases: It's under the bridge.
它在桥下。
She has been under the bridge since the holidays.
她从假期起就一直在桥下。
Whatever you do, it's under the bridge now.
无论你做什么，它现在在桥下了。
Your eyes are beautiful under the bridge.
你的眼睛在桥下很美。
It's the least I could do under the bridge.
这是我在桥下能做的最少的事。
Life isn't easy under the bridge.
生活在桥下不容易。
Nothing would make me happier than to get away from under the bridge.
没有什么比从桥下逃离更让我开心的了。
It's not far under the bridge.
它在桥下不远。
The only real hope we have left is under the bridge.
我们剩下的唯一真正的希望在桥下。
She has a kind heart under the bridge.
她在桥下有一颗善良的心。
She has been sick since the bridge.
她从桥起就一直生病。
Whatever he says, the bridge is not far ahead now.
无论他说什么，桥现在不远了。
It's the least I could do at the bridge.
这是我在桥边能做的最少的事。
Life under the bridge isn't easy.
桥下的生活不容易。
The bridge is meant to be a challenge.
桥本来就是一个挑战。
Nothing would make me happier than to get away from the bridge.
没有什么比从桥逃离更让我开心的了。
The only real hope we have left is the bridge.
我们剩下的唯一真正的希望是桥。
Your eyes are beautiful near the bridge.
你的眼睛在桥边很美。
She has a kind heart at the bridge.
她在桥边有一颗善良的心。
It's under the bridge.
它在桥下。
